action.des: Royals challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: With Francisco Lindor batting, Roberto Perez caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Salvador Perez to shortstop Alcides Escobar.
action.des_es: Royals reto (tocar al corredor) sustentado, se cambia la decisión: Con Francisco Lindor bateando, Roberto Perez atrapado robando la 2da base, receptor Salvador Perez a campo corto Alcides Escobar.
